attributes.action: Dismiss parliament for failure to uphold the original terms of the EU referendum
attributes.additional_details:
Ref : David Cameron, Chatham House speech, 10 Nov 2015.
https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-speech-on-europe
Over 100 times Theresa May stated we would leave on 29th March 2019 Deal or No Deal
attributes.background: We were told before the referendum that "If we vote to leave, we will leave. They’ll not be another renegotiation or another referendum.” Yet all we have seen is negotiation and renegotiation in order to water down the decision made by the people.  We need a government that 100% believes in Brexit

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "dismiss Parliament".

If you would like another General Election you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
